description: Your family will love this healthier no-bake cheesecake tart with a creamy ricotta filling and a strawberry, basil and balsamic syrup topping.
keywords: Healthier No-Bake Strawberry & Basil Cheesecake Tart
name: Healthier No-Bake Strawberry & Basil Cheesecake Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.33 cup Woolworths toasted honey & cinnamon muesli

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tart from pan. Top tart with strawberries, basil and extra thyme sprigs, then drizzle with balsamic syrup and serve immediately.
